text:
WINGS

Mix & Match by the Pound: Served with veggie sticks & your choice of Ranch or Blue Cheese dipping sauce.
Sauced: Mild, Medium, Hot, Suicide, Sriracha Honey, Louisiana Sweet Heat, Tequila Habanero, Honey Garlic, Sweet Chili, San Fransisco Spicy Garlic, Smoked Applewood, Roasted Red Pepper, Parmesan & Herb, Dry Hot, Brazilian BBQ, West Coast Quake, All Dressed, Maple Bacon, Sour Cream & Onion, Spicy Dill, Lemon Pepper
Dry: Seasoned, Salt & Vinegar, Dill Pickle, Salt & Pepper, Cajun, Smoked Applewood, Roasted Red Pepper, Parmesan & Herb, Dry Hot, Brazilian BBQ, West Coast Quake, All Dressed, Maple Bacon, Sour Cream & Onion, Spicy Dill, Lemon Pepper
LB: $14
2 LBS: $27
3 LBS: $40
4 LBS: $54
6 LBS: $68
8 LBS: $85

Extra Veggie Sticks: $3
Extra Dip: $1
APPY'S

Deep Fried Pickles: 8 Battered pickle spears served with ranch dip. $11
Onion Rings: A generous portion of thick cut onion rings. $9
Potato Skins: 6 potato skins filled with cheese, bacon and green onions. $11
Mushroom Caps: Half Pound of battered mushrooms served with Ranch dip. $11
Mozza Sticks: 8 Mozza sticks served with Ranch or Marinara dip. $11
Mini Burgers: 4 Homemade burgers topped with cheese, lettuce & tomatoes. $11
Nachos Combo: Pick Any 3 for $28
NACHOS

Our nachos are served with your choice of 2 meat toppings & cheese. $13
Meat Toppings: $3
Veggie Toppings: $2
Tomatoes, Green Peppers, Green Onions, Bacon, Ground Beef & Chicken
Extra Cheese: $3
THE FAVOURITES

Fries and Gravy: A nude helping of fresh cut fries served with gravy. $5
Poutine: Fresh cut fries topped with cheese curds & gravy. $10
Perogies: 1/2 dozen of "Baba's Best" served with sauteed onions, bacon & sour cream. $10
Veggie Plate: A generous platter of in-season veggies with ranch or blue cheese dip. $13
THE MAINS

All items below are served with choice of Fries, Caesar Salad or Greek Salad.

Shooter Burger: Homemade beef patty, thick cut onion rings & our shooter sauce with lettuce & tomato. $15

Club House: A triple decker sandwich layered with turkey, lettuce, tomato, bacon and cheese served on your choice of bread. $15

Wicked Chicken: 2 Deep fried white meat fillets topped with Havarti cheese, Sriracha Aioli, lettuce & tomato. $14

Chicken Fingers: 4 Chicken fingers deep fried to a golden brown and served with plum sauce. $14

Hamburger: Homemade beef patty cooked to perfection, with lettuce & tomato. $11

Add Cheese: $1

Add Bacon: $2

Maltese's Hot Italian: Locally made sausage served with sauteed peppers & onions. $7

Add Fries: $3
name: Shooter's Tavern
